meanings.sent1: The terriblenesses of the storm kept us indoors all day.
meanings.sent2: The movie was full of terriblenesses that made it hard to watch.
meanings.sent3: Despite the terriblenesses of the situation, we managed to find some humor in it.
meanings.sent4: The terriblenesses of war can never truly be understood by those who haven't experienced it.
meanings.sent5: The terriblenesses of the haunted house were etched into our memories forever.

meanings.sent2: The terriblenesses of the accident were evident in the wreckage.
meanings.sent3: The terriblenesses of his cooking skills were revealed when the smoke alarm went off.
